name: sharp
author: Lovell Fuller <npm@lovell.info>
description: High performance Node.js module to resize JPEG, PNG, WebP and TIFF images using the libvips library

scripts.test-compare: OUT=alpha-layer-out-compare.png && cd test/fixtures && compare -fuzz 0.5% alpha-layer-out-im.png output.overlay-alpha-out-012-sharp.png $OUT 2> /dev/null || open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-compare-low-alpha: OUT=alpha-layer-out-low-alpha-compare.png && cd test/fixtures && compare -fuzz 0.5% alpha-layer-out-low-alpha-im.png alpha-layer-out-low-alpha-vips.png $OUT 2> /dev/null || open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-composite: OUT=alpha-layer-out-vips.png && npm run build-composite && cd test/fixtures && ../../build/composite alpha-layer-1-fill.png alpha-layer-0-background.png alpha-out-t1.png && ../../build/composite alpha-layer-2-ink.png alpha-out-t1.png $OUT && rm alpha-out-t1.png && open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-composite-im: OUT=alpha-layer-out-im.png && cd test/fixtures && composite alpha-layer-1-fill.png alpha-layer-0-background.png alpha-out-t1.png && composite alpha-layer-2-ink.png alpha-out-t1.png $OUT && rm alpha-out-t1.png && open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-composite-low-alpha: OUT=alpha-layer-out-low-alpha-vips.png && npm run build-composite && cd test/fixtures && ../../build/composite alpha-layer-2-ink-low-alpha.png alpha-layer-1-fill-low-alpha.png $OUT && open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-composite-low-alpha-im: OUT=alpha-layer-out-low-alpha-im.png && cd test/fixtures && composite alpha-layer-2-ink-low-alpha.png alpha-layer-1-fill-low-alpha.png $OUT && open $OUT && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.test-overlay: OUT=test/fixtures/output.overlay-alpha-out-012-sharp.png && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && rm -f $OUT && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha ./test/unit/overlay.js && open $OUT
